name: The Forbidden Mirror
description:
A  mysterious mirror , just like any other mirror is giving reflection, but the only difference is that the person on the other side of the mirror can kill you. 

Whatever you do or where ever you go, the reflection will replicate your movement. If you both have guns in your hand, use the environment to escape your reflections shooting.

Both sides of the mirror are 99% same, with 1% difference. Use that difference to your advantage to make sure your reflection doesn't kill you.

MY  GITHUB !!!
